short_summary: Mobile destruction services in Ontario region
description: The public service of Canada is seeking a business to provide mobile destruction (shredding) services for the Ontario region. The work will involve the following: * delivering mobile destruction services for paper; * having a sufficient number of resources, suppliers, and equipment to meet all of the requirements; * providing regular and unscheduled shredding services; * destroying protected A and B information in a controlled and isolated area; * providing lockable, drop slot bins and consoles; * installing bins and consoles in secure areas; and, * handling bins and consoles in a specified manner. The estimated duration of the contract is 5 years. Interested businesses can submit a request for standing offer (RFSA) to participate in this procurement opportunity.
full_summary: **Government Tender Announcement: Mobile Destruction Services for Ontario Region** **Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) - Solicitation Number:** 21401-28-4329780-A **Amendment Number:** 1 **Public Notice Date:** July 24, 2023 **Closing Date for Bids:** July 30, 2023 (14:00:00) ## Project Overview The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) seeks a reliable and experienced supplier to provide Mobile Destruction Services for Ontario Region, including Central District and Greater Ontario Nunavut District. ## Key Services - Frequent (regularly scheduled) or unscheduled (one-time, occasional) services - Mobile shredding services for CSC facilities at the chosen frequency - On-site destruction of Protected A and B information in a controlled and isolated area - Compliance with RCMP guidelines for security requirements ## Technical Requirements - Provide sufficient resources, suppliers, and equipment to meet requirements for multiple service areas (up to 8) - Install bins and consoles in secure areas with continuous observation - Destroy Protected A and B information in a controlled and isolated area - Comply with CSC's security requirements ## Evaluation Criteria - Lowest priced compliant bid ## Notice to Bidders * CFTA trade agreement applies * Complete statement of work and evaluation criteria available on Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders * Contractors may submit bids for up to 8 service areas * Debriefing available upon contract award to all bidders **Attachments** - RFSA Document - Amendment Document The rewritten text has a cleaner structure, and referenced sources like CFTA and solicitation documents available on Buyandsell.gc.ca for access to additional information, including evaluation criteria and annexes related to the solicitation.
